Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.repositories

Interface OrderRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Order,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Order,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Order,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Order,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Order,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Order>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Order,Integer>
@Repository public interface OrderRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Order,Integer>
Repository interface for accessing order data

  • Method Details

    • findOrders

      @Query(" SELECT o\n FROM Order o\n WHERE (:userID IS NULL OR o.user.id = :userID)\n AND (:minTotalAmount IS NULL OR o.totalAmount >= :minTotalAmount)\n AND (:maxTotalAmount IS NULL OR o.totalAmount <= :maxTotalAmount)\n AND (:status IS NULL OR o.status = :status)\n") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Order> findOrders(Integer userID, Double minTotalAmount, Double maxTotalAmount, Status status, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of orders filtered by the specified parameters
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user who placed the orders (optional)
      minTotalAmount - the minimum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      maxTotalAmount - the maximum total amount of the orders to search for (optional)
      status - the status of the orders to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of orders

    • existsByUser_IdAndId

      boolean existsByUser_IdAndId(Integer userID, Integer orderID)
      Checks if an order with the given ID exists for the specified user
      Parameters:
      userID - the ID of the user who placed the order
      orderID - the ID of the order to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the order exists, false otherwise
